tool_description: Get staking info of OHM and OHM forks. Using EthersJS to pull data directly from contracts.
title: fohmo-backend

api_list.name: GetStakingInfo
api_list.description: Gets fork details and balance info.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fohmo-backend.p.rapidapi.com/GetStakingInfo"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fohmo-backend.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetStakingInfoQuery
api_list.description: GetStakingInfo as a get to be compatible with rapidapi and google sheets.

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fohmo-backend.p.rapidapi.com/GetStakingInfo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fohmo-backend.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
